definition: solely preoccupied (with one thing)/engrossed/focusing (on sth)/to look after only one aspect
to look after/to take into consideration/to attend to

sentences.english: He did not respond I have only concentrated on the very floor to Dongdong Dong.
sentences.chinese: 他沒有迴應我，只顧咚咚咚上得樓來。

sentences.english: The fish just moved away slowly and the old man could not raise him an inch.
sentences.chinese: 那魚只顧慢慢地遊開去，老人無法把它往上拉一英寸。

sentences.english: People drive right down a road and never notice an old woman like that.
sentences.chinese: 亻們只顧趕路，從不會注意到那樣一個老。

sentences.english: He was so busy clocking her that he spilt a glass of beer over the table-cloth.
sentences.chinese: 他只顧目不轉睛地盯着她，竟把一杯啤酒灑在桌布上。

sentences.english: But when they looked only to their footing, they did not see the elk .
sentences.chinese: 然而當他們只顧注意自己的腳步時，卻看不到麋了。

sentences.english: "Too many people just run out the door, " says Mazzocchi.
sentences.chinese: “太多的人只顧急吼吼地離開，”馬佐奇說。

sentences.english: Each one for himself in times of peril.
sentences.chinese: 在危難的時刻人人都只顧自己。

sentences.english: But, eyes raised, he drank in the pure night.
sentences.chinese: 但他只顧舉目向天，啜飲純淨的夜色。

sentences.english: He is in from height merely ice bewail, be at a loss unexpectedly rise.
sentences.chinese: 他只顧自個兒在冰上嘆惜，竟不知所措起來。

sentences.english: And the Rat pressed forward on his way without waiting for an answer.
sentences.chinese: 河鼠不等鼴鼠回答，只顧悶頭向前趕路。

sentences.english: I was determined to become as self-involved and uncaring as possible.
sentences.chinese: 我決定要儘量只顧自己不再去表達關心了。

sentences.english: Who pleasure, not intentional of heaven, the Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 天道，只顧享樂，無心修佛。

sentences.english: A self-indulgent America opened the flood-gates of chaos .
sentences.chinese: 一個只顧自己的美國爲混亂敞開了大門。

sentences.english: Maria thought speaking out of the question, and the gentlemen did nothing but eat and admire.
sentences.chinese: 瑪麗亞根本不想講話，男客們只顧一邊喫一邊讚美。

sentences.english: She stared at the beefcake and got lost.
sentences.chinese: 她因爲只顧看那個猛男了，居然迷路了。

sentences.english: Only at swallow does rear its head.
